title: You are missing out on critical features
body: With Cloudflare Pro access valuable features like WAF protection against new and common attacks including OWASP, automatic image optimization, additional Page Rules for customization, and protection against bad bots from any source (not just from major cloud providers).

title: Get Closer to a 100% Cache Hit Ratio
body: Increase your cache hit ratio, reduce egress fees, and improve site load times. Join the thousands of developers who are achieving cost-effective web performance optimization with Cache Reserve.
